item.description:
Join us for some fresh ocean air and fun in the sun at Salisbury Beach! Come with your umbrellas and frisbees to enjoy the beach, and we'll all get pizza and play video games on the boardwalk!

http://www.salisbury-beach.org/

*If anyone needs a ride, please note what town and or T stop you are coming from. And if you can provide a ride please note that also.

 

DRIVING DIRECTIONS: I marked the parking lot we're aiming for in the map above. Click on the map link for Salisbury beach, or read the page below.

http://www.salisbury-beach.org/salisbury-beach-driving-directions.html

 

PARKING: There is abundant parking for $7 at the Salisbury Beach Reservation. Let's meet on the beach around parking lot P3 on this map. (for some reason, they posted the map sideways, so the left side is south)

http://www.salisbury-beach.org/resources/salisbury_beach_state_park_campground.gif

 

CONTACT INFO: IF YOU NEED TO REACH ME, MY CELL NUMBER IS 617-319-9205. We will set up camp around Steve's colorful umbrella.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Sun, Sand, and Pizza at Salisbury Beach!
